response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we propose a special introductory price of $14,500 for you. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to experience the excellence of our product without compromising on your budget. We believe this price reflects the true worth of the product while providing you with a significant savings. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we'll arrange for immediate delivery. Thank you for considering our product, and we look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 14500}
